experience.description:
- Search for products in Chinese market and negotiate purchasing with suppliers (via WeChat and phone etc.), establish and maintain relationship with suppliers
- Prepare transaction documents for foreign economic activities, prepare contracts, invoices, payment orders and other documents in Both Chinese and English
- Interact with sales, logistics, customs and other related teams as product manager
- Participate in making or confirming the strategic plan of products; Mainly responsible for the company's telecommunications and PV products, such as switches, RRU, PV modules, etc. 
- Collect and analyse relevant market demands and industry trend, as well as competitor development status, and provide decision-making referenceto top manager
-Integrate product information, write related product documents and quotation, etc

Project experience：
1. CAS Virtualization Platform Project - Sitronics  07/21- Now 
- As a key project of the company, participated in assisting the management to design products according to customer needs and local regulations, and negotiated with suppliers to adjust product functions; 
- Mainly responsible for cleanroom and license Platform, including assisting field engineers in debugging and installation, testing software, making product information presentation and product quotation, applying for local network access certificate for some hardware products, etc. 
- Responsible for the design of product after-sales service system, including training, on-site, remote technical support service system. 

2. RRU sales and technology transfer project - Itech  07/21- 11/21 
- In the testing stage, mainly responsible for communicating and negotiating with suppliers Hytera in early stage, assisting in designing and adjusting products that meet customer needs and local regulations, communicating with customers and summarizing RRU test reports；solve the problems encountered by customers in the testing process, and following up logistic information of sample products. 
- In Technology Transfer and Sale stage, mainly responsible for the technology transfer contract, product quotation, product access certificate after product testing process; and assist the management team to push forward the project, especially to solve related product problems in the communication between customers and suppliers.

experience.position: Key Account Manager/Chinese Foreign Activities Manager

experience.description:
- Master professional drawing and simulation software such as CAD, Solidworks and Fluent, and be familiar with the raw materials, molds, installation, equipment, art process and various technologies and quality standards of electric blade manufacturing; - Responsible for solving technical problems in the manufacturing process of blades ; 
- Collaborative manufacturing, quality and other departments continue to improve mass-produced products.

Project Experience： 

Zhuzhou Fenghuangshan Wind Power Project 9/14-11/14 
Participated in the design, modification, production and manufacturing process of 2.0MW fan blades, assisted the senior engineer in the team to design and improve the existing 1.5MW wind turbine blades according to the needs of the project owner and wind field wind resources, and was mainly responsible for the two-dimensional CAD drawing process. During this process, iteration data deviation was found in the original design, and timely feedback was given to avoid loss of the company. At the same time, assist the production department to participate in the manufacturing process, timely solve the relevant technical problems, successfully complete the project design and production tasks, and shorten the expected delivery time.
